name: Nightmare Fist
text: You are even more deadly in magical darkness.
prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Intimidate 1 rank, ability to create magical darkness.
benefit: While fighting within an area of magical darkness, you gain a +2 bonus on damage rolls with unarmed strikes, or a +4 bonus against opponents that are shaken, frightened, or panicked. You also gain a +2 morale bonus on Acrobatics and Intimidate checks.
staminaText: When fighting in an area of magical darkness, you can spend up to 5 stamina points to increase the bonus granted by this feat on one damage roll by double the number of stamina points you spent.
text_zh: 你在黑暗中总是显得更为致命。
prerequisites_zh: 精通徒手打击，威吓1级，创造魔法黑暗的能力。
benefit_zh: 当处于一片魔法黑暗中时，你的徒手打击伤害获得+2加值；若对手处于颤栗、惊惧或者恐慌状态，该加值变为+4。此外，你在黑暗中时，特技和威吓技能检定也会有+2士气加值。
staminaText_zh: 当你在魔法黑暗中战斗时，你可以消耗至多5点耐力来提升这个专长在一次伤害骰上赋予的加值，提升的点数等于你消耗耐力的两倍。
